==Description==
Since <b>version [[Version_3.0.0|3.0.0]]</b>, the <code>posts_search</code> filter is used to filter the search SQL that is used in the WHERE clause of WP_Query.

== Triggers ==
This function is applied once, in {{Trac|wp-includes/class-wp-query.php|trunk|2056}} - in <tt>get_posts()</tt> on line 2056.
